message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This exceptional item holds significant value to me, but recognizing its potential worth to you, I am eager to share it. I am offering you the chance to own this masterpiece at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is an exclusive offer tailored to acknowledge your discerning taste and appreciation for quality. Please let me know if you would like to proceed with this offer.
